oriSent: The President of South Korea's house, also known as the Yongsan Presidential Office, is located in Seoul and has been the official residence and workplace of the President of South Korea since The building was originally constructed in 1926 as a Japanese government office, and was later used as the headquarters of the Korean government during the Japanese colonial period.

question: When was the current Presidential Office Building completed?
oriSent: After Korea gained independence in 1945, the building was used as the office of the President of South Korea until 1963, when the current Presidential Office Building was completed.
